ski.name: CARDIAC CONTROL
desc: Crunch an enemy unit's heart with magic, dealing high damage and blinding for 1 second. Triggers a magic bomb after a short delay if target unit dies, dealing bonus AOE magical damage. Improved: always triggers AOE damage.

ski.name: UNDEAD UNGULATE
desc: Dark orbs drop to the ground, dealing damage and Confusing target units with less than 50% Health for 1 second before coalescing into the form of a black goat which chases enemy units for 5 seconds dealing continuous magical damage to those nearby. Improved: summons an even stronger black goat.
data: Improved Black Goat Magical Damage per 0.5s: 35/45/55/65
study: Deals damage and causes Confusion. Summons a black goat
update: Magical Damage â†‘ Black Goat Power â†‘

ski.name: QUANTUM MAGIC
desc: Constructs a quantum array that triggers Skylight: after a short interval a piercing column of light beams down, dealing devastating damage to the area. Improved: beam deal continuous damage to target area for 3 seconds.
study: Deals bonus damage to a target area

ski.name: INTENSIFICATION
desc: Active: releases a large number of buffs for 3 seconds including increased movement speed and damage reduction. Also improves abilities. Passive: high-level immunity to physical damage. Completely negates physical damage taken below a certain threshold while blunting stronger physical attacks.
study: Passive reduces damage while actively granting buffs
update: Buff Effect â†‘ Damage Reduction â†‘
